j2k

Class JpipDataSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • j2k.JpipDataSegment

  • public class JpipDataSegment
extends java.lang.Object
    The class JpipDataSegment is used to construct objects to store segments of JPIP data. These segments can be data-bin segments as well as EOR messages. In this last case, the EOR code is stored in the id field and the EOR message body is stored in the data field.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Juan Pablo Garcia Ortiz
    See Also:
    JpipDataInputStream

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      long aux
      The data-bin auxiliary information.
      long classId
      The data-bin class identifier.
      long codestream
      The code-stream index.
      byte[] data
      The segment data.
      long id
      The data-bin in-class identifier.
      boolean isEOR
      Indicates if this segment is a End Of Response message.
      boolean isFinal
      Indicates if this segment is the last one (when there is a data segment stream).
      long length
      Length of this segment.
      long offset
      Offset of this segment within the data-bin data.
